snippet: Leobardo Espinoza Jr., a student at Topeka High School in Kansas, is one of eight high school seniors around the world who are blogging about their college searches.
abstract: Leobardo Espinoza Jr., a student at Topeka High School in Kansas, is one of eight high school seniors around the world who are blogging about their college searches.

headline.main: Beginning a Journey That Could Make Family History
